div.p: Petor(zmethis) son of Bienchis [has paid] 8 dr. on account [for] the poll tax of the 14th year of Domitian, [Caesar], the lord, [the same (man)] (has paid) the remaining 9 dr., the total 17 dr. I, [Sokrates], tax collector, have written. [Year 15] of Domitian, Caesar, the lord, 10th Phaophi. Translation: S.A. Aly, ZPE 219 (2021) 150
